subject: Baseball
Japanese-Americans
Asian-Americans
Minorities (US)
lead_paragraph: Don Wakamatsu of the Seattle Mariners, a Japanese-American, is the first manager of Asian descent in the majors. He takes his role as a trailblazer seriously.
snippet: Don Wakamatsu of the Seattle Mariners, a Japanese-American, is the first manager of Asian descent in the majors. He takes his role as a trailblazer seriously.
